languages.text: "Почему ты остался на корабле, раз получил свободу?"
"If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"
languages.original_text: "Почему ты остался на корабле, раз получил свободу?"

traits.locale_text: "If you got your freedom, why did you stay on this ship?"
"If you got your freedom, why did you stay on this ship?"
"If you got your freedom, why did you stay on this ship?"
"If you got your freedom, why did you stay on this ship?"
"If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"
"If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"

languages.text: «Si es libre, ¿por qué se quedó en la nave?».
languages.original_text: "If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: «Si es libre, ¿por qué se quedó en la nave?».

languages.text: 「自由を手に入れたのに、なぜ船に残った？」
languages.original_text: "If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: 「自由を手に入れたのに、なぜ船に残った？」

languages.text: “既然你已经得到了自由，那为什么还要留在船上？”
languages.original_text: "If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: “既然你已经得到了自由，那为什么还要留在船上？”

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr Eure Freiheit bekommen habt, warum seid Ihr dann auf dem Schiff geblieben?"
languages.original_text: "If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr Eure Freiheit bekommen habt, warum seid Ihr dann auf dem Schiff geblieben?"

languages.text: « Puisque vous étiez libre de partir, pourquoi avoir choisi de rester à bord ? »
languages.original_text: "If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vous étiez libre de partir, pourquoi avoir choisi de rester à bord ? »

languages.original_text: "If you got your freedom, why did you stay on the ship?"
